duties_responsibilities.duty: Greet and register guests, provide outstanding customer service, and settle guest accounts.
Handle hotel operator and concierge duties, and make/modify reservations.
Maximize room revenue and occupancy, while ensuring attentive, courteous, and efficient service to all guests.
Maintain high standards of personal appearance and grooming, and comply with hotel policies and regulations.
Respond to guest inquiries, handle check-ins/check-outs, and operate the Front Desk computer system.
Maintain an up-to-date knowledge of property amenities, local attractions, and emergency procedures.
Maintain regular attendance and create an enjoyable work environment for guests and associates.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent required; College coursework in a related field helpful.
